Package com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.server.service

Interface Summary
GameWorldManager The GameWorldManager interface exposes application level access to the GameWorldService running inside of the Project Darkstar stack.
GameWorldService The GameWorldService provides utility methods to calculate collision detection and spatial information against the static game world geometry.
 

Class Summary
GameWorldManagerImpl The GameWorldManagerImpl implements the GameWorldManager and provides application level access to the GameWorldService running inside of the Project Darkstar stack.
GameWorldServiceImpl The GameWorldServiceImpl is an implementation of a Project Darkstar service that provides utility methods to calculate collision detection and spatial information against the static game world geometry.
